title: 没有办法用高清材质，HD修复过了
author: LYC0092008
txt_content:
一点就跳出，再进入就报Mods loaded: 7ModLoader Beta 1.5_01
mod_ZanMinimap 1.5_01 - v0.9.8
mod_Stackables Beta 1.5_01
mod_Fossils Beta 1.5_01_fossilinator-inator
mod_wallclock Beta 1.5_01 - By Nandonalt
mod_LightSensor Beta 1.5_01
mod_Millenaire Millénaire 0.3.5

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT acb9c9ab --------
Generated 11-5-18 下午12:46

Minecraft: Minecraft Beta 1.5_01
OS: Windows Vista (x86) version 6.0
Java: 1.6.0_25, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce 7300 LE/PCI/SSE2 version 2.1.2, NVIDIA Corporation

java.nio.BufferOverflowException

at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.put(Unknown Source)

at java.nio.ByteBuffer.put(Unknown Source)

at ip.a(SourceFile:178)

at ip.a(SourceFile:84)

at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.w(SourceFile:384)

at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:299)

at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:658)

at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT d212b6e ----------
必须删了材质才能静如游戏


还有，HD修复时第一个选项是灰色的，我觉得很重要。

replies.author: god-dog
replies.txt_content: 用的是哪個高清材質？版本是否對應？

replies.author: 哥。蛋疼
replies.txt_content:
高清材质不是一般电脑能带的动的~希望楼主能了解。

高清材质，首先要确定你电脑能不能跑得动，你可以现实是没有MOD 的原始版本换高清的材质。如果用没有MOD的版本能跑得懂的话，那么就出现在MOD上的冲突了~

材质也是有版本对应的~

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
和材質的版本无关 过期的材质新方块也会显示 不过是个紫色的方块罢了
lz先更新mc 然后先打高清材质补丁 主意用最新的高清补丁 然后备份jar 开始装mod 一个一个试 我看代码看下来貌似是mod冲突

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
LZ最好先说明一下安装的材质名称, 有的材质会有特别的安装要求. 

另外...
在村庄MOD的FAQ里看到这么一句: 
Zan Minimap: Compatible, **Enabling threading will crash your game after sometime. 
所以也有可能是村庄MOD跟小地图MOD相冲突了...

replies.author: 哥。蛋疼
replies.txt_content: 纯净版都进不去  有可能是机子跑不动的原因吧~

replies.author: LYC0092008
replies.txt_content: 1.3用HD材质是可以的，不存在跑不动。

replies.author: LYC0092008
replies.txt_content: 原来修复不成功，现在可以了、
